attributes.action: restore Edward Jenner's Statue to Trafalgar Square in time for the 30th Anniversary of the Eradication of Smallpox in 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Edward Jenner, the man who changed the world, saved more lives than anyone else in history by pioneering vaccination (against Smallpox). His statue, currently in Kensington Gardens, used to be in Trafalgar Square and should be retuned there in time for the 30th Anniversary of the worldwide eradication of smallpox, in 2010. It is time for one of our great national heroes to finally be celebrated.
